hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant destroy -f $JOB_NAME cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant up $JOB_NAME # Sed apt source in fr because my ci is in france cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i sed -i 's@http.us.debian.org@ftp.fr.debian.org@' /etc/apt/sources.list"

cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i apt-get update" cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin:/sbin apt-get install -y git quilt git-buildpackage pbuilder cowbuilder" cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "git clone https://github.com/enovance/numeter"
####DEBUG#### cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i PATH=\$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/sbin:/usr/sbin UPSTREAM_BRANCH=update_oslo.messaging GIT_PBUILDER_OUTPUT_DIR=/tmp \$PWD/numeter/extra/build-package.sh wheezy"
#cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "cd numeter && sudo -i PATH=\$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/sbin:/usr/sbin UPSTREAM_BRANCH=master GIT_PBUILDER_OUTPUT_DIR=/tmp ./extra/build-package.sh wheezy" ####
#------------------------ # Add debian jessie source for package like python-stevedore (>= 0.12) preferences='"Package: *\nPin: release o=Debian,a=testing,n=jessie\nPin-Priority: 100\n"' cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "echo -e $preferences | sudo -i tee /etc/apt/preferences.d/debian-jessie"
repo='deb http://ftp.fr.debian.org/debian jessie main contrib' cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "echo $repo | sudo -i tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/debian-jessie.list"
# Add enovance repo for oslo-* repo='deb http://havana.pkgs.enovance.com/debian havana main' cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "echo $repo | sudo -i tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/debian-havana.list" repo='deb http://havana.pkgs.enovance.com/debian havana-backports main' cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "echo $repo | sudo -i tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/debian-havana.list" cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i apt-key adv --recv-keys --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com 64AA94D00B849883"
####DEBUG#### cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i apt-get update"
cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i apt-get install -y -t jessie python-stevedore" cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i apt-get install -y python-oslo.messaging"
#exit 0 ####
#-------------------- # Add source for package like oslo.messaging (not actually in wheezy) repo='deb http://repo:reiY5ib6@repo.numeter.com numeter-jenkins main contrib non-free' #cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "echo $repo | sudo -i tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/numeter-jenkins.list" key='-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK----- Version: GnuPG v1.4.12 (GNU/Linux)

cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "echo '$key' | sudo -i apt-key add -" #----------------------------------------------------------
cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i apt-get update"
# test package cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i PATH=\$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/sbin:/usr/sbin PACKAGES_PATH=/tmp \$PWD/numeter/extra/package_test.sh --go"
